name: Researchskills
tagline: Lecture notes for research skills course
body:
### General infos This site contains material and links for the MSc module Research Skills. The objective of this course is to to learn discipline-independent skills for doing quantitative research at the graduate-level. ### Course content Introduction to philosophy and history of science, scientific method, finding your question, design of experiments, ensuring reproducibility, data analysis in R, visualization, introduction to LaTeX, scientific writing, logic and clarity, scientific presentations, good scientific practice ### Important links for participants * [Syllabus](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/blob/master/Syllabus/Syllabus2015.pdf?raw=true) - timetable and room information for the course * [Campus management](https://www.verwaltung.uni-freiburg.de/lsfserver/rds?state=verpublish&status=init&vmfile=no&publishid=138902&moduleCall=webInfo&publishConfFile=webInfo&publishSubDir=veranstaltung) - the course description in the course catalog of the university * [Ilias page](https://ilias.uni-freiburg.de/goto.php?target=exc_262099&client_id=unifreiburg) - course material will be posted here Questions / contact: [Florian Hartig](http://www.biom.uni-freiburg.de/mitarbeiter/hartig) ### Course materials and further readings #### Lecture notes * Slides of the lectures, as well as further readings and exercises will be posted on Ilias * Lecture notes will be available here soon #### Practicals * Practical Literature Research: [practical](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/raw/master/Labs/Literature/Practical/Practical_LiteratureResearch.pdf) * Practicals R Stats: [tutorial](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/raw/master/Labs/R/Script/Crashcourse-StatisticsWithR.pdf) / [code](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/R) / [stats help website](http://biometry.github.io/APES/) (experimental) * [Version Control](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/VersionControl) * [LaTeX](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/LaTeX/), see in particular this [pdf tutorial](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/raw/master/Labs/LaTeX/Script/how_to_latex.pdf) * [Scientific Writing](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/ScientificWriting) ### Past courses * Winter term 12/13 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) * Winter term 12/13 (1-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Renewable Energy Management) * Winter term 13/14 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) * Winter term 14/15 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) ### Authors and copyright Unless specified otherwise, the author of these materials is Florian Hartig.
